price: Sikuwashuhudisha kuumbwa kwa mbingu na ardhi, wala kuumbwa kwa nafsi zao. Wala sikuwafanya wapotezao kuwa ni wasaidizi.
arabic: ۞ مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا
footnotes: Mimi sikumwonyesha Iblisi wala dhuriya zake nilipo umba mbingu wala ardhi, wala sikuwashuhudisha baadhi yao nilipo waumba wenzao ili wanisaidie. Wala sikuwa nina haja ya msaidizi wowote, licha kuwa nikatafute wapotovu ndio wawe wasaidizi wangu. Basi yawaje mnakwenda mt'ii Shetani na mkaniasi Mimi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā ashhadttuhum khalqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walā khalqa anfusihim wamā kuntu muttakhidha al-muḍilīna ʿaḍudan
